description:
Tooltip component displays informative text when users hover over, focus on, or tap an element.
It supports titles, subtitles, and customization of placement and theme.
name: Tooltip

tags.name: example
tags.text:
With subtitle
<Tooltip
title="User profile"
subtitle="View and edit your personal information"
>
<Avatar>JD</Avatar>
</Tooltip>

tags.name: example
tags.text: With placement Hover me Hover me Hover me Hover me

tags.name: example
tags.text: Controlled tooltip const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); Hover won't affect this tooltip

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Disabled tooltip
<Tooltip
title="This won't show"
disabled={true}
>
<Button>Hover me (no tooltip)</Button>
</Tooltip>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
With custom theme
<Tooltip
title="Custom theme"
themeOverride="day"
>
<Button>Hover me</Button>
</Tooltip>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
With arrow
<Tooltip
title="Tooltip with arrow"
arrow
>
<Button>Hover me</Button>
</Tooltip>
